description.p: Ibus-Typing Booster is a predictive input method and predicts complete words based on partial input. One can then simply select the desired word from a list of suggestions and improve one’s typing speed and spelling.
Input methods are typing systems allowing users to input complex languages. They are necessary because these contain too many characters to simply be laid out on a traditional keyboard.
